title: Among Us
short_plot_summary: Players work together to repair a spaceship while hidden impostors sabotage the mission and eliminate crewmates.
explanation: A rocket, symbolizing the spaceship setting of the game
Busts in silhouette, representing the group of players working together as crewmates
A detective, illustrating the investigative and deductive aspects of the game
A kitchen knife, signifying the impostors' ability to eliminate crewmates
A speech bubble, symbolizing the in-game discussions and communication among players to identify the impostors
